title: ［英語討論區，齊學好英語］有冇高手入嚟幫下我？

replies.msg:
Any people who are good at English could help us?
Like most of the people in Hong Kong, I could only write basic English.
I want to polish my English to have a better future.
However, I could use English in a rare environment.
When I have questions about English, I have no one to ask.
I think some one face similar situation so I would like to start a topic here to gather people who are interested in learning English.

Let's me throw the first question.
Of the critically ill patients, seven were under the age of 60, three of them younger than 50. (from SCMP)
I don't know why we use "of"
I know the use of "of" like "one of the tables is broken", but there is no one before "of" in the sentence above.

我有個好戇鳩但係好有效而且免費嘅方法
睇你有冇決心
無論係英文新聞報道，定還是任何嘅電視劇集，乜鳩都得，只要佢講一句英文，你咁停，跟佢講一次
一定要讀出聲！
唔需要理解個句說話係點解，持之以恆。
一個星期你會感覺到自己明顯進步
一個月你開始覺得英文唔係咁難
大約兩三個月後，你可以正式咁咪去睇返一啲正規嘅英文學習書本，跟住你就會突飛猛進

到時，當你見到一啲錯嘅英文，你一聽落去就會覺得好唔自然，好唔順暢，你會識得自我去糾正，去搜尋答案
俾後面用 "seven (Of the critically ill patients) were under the age of 60, three of them (the critically ill patients) younger than 50"

唔好淨係學 grammar, 學下啲鬼佬點講點 present
淨係睇書學出黎啲英文會奇奇怪怪
